name: Return to the Light
description:
This game is playable on Windows and Mac OS using the keyboard.

Escape the dark depths of the sewer and return to the light by navigating past dangerous creatures and obstacles in this gritty first-person runner-on-rails experience.

Controls:

Space to Jump

Credits:

  • Unity Asset Store Packs:
    • Modular Metro Tunnels by Asset  Maiden
    • Fantastic Creature #1 by Grigoriyarx
  • Base Code by Michael Baker
  • Audio was sourced from Freesound.org and mixed in Audacity
    • 01868 monster moan.wav
    • Cthulhu growl.wav
    • Creepy moaning
    • breathing_heavy.wav
    • Water Cave
